snippet: Millions of children are getting treatment in a national effort to prevent parasitic worms from infecting them and impairing their mental and physical development.
abstract: Indian Health Ministry initiates deworming treatment for 270 million children in national campaign aimed at preventing parasitic worm infections.
lead_paragraph: Millions of children are getting treatment in a national effort to prevent parasitic worms from infecting them and impairing their mental and physical development.
